channel.title: Why cant people join my server? after portforward
channel.description:
I have portforwarded and made the server public however only me and server staff can join the server. Some others can but most people log in and a black screen will come up (As they say) and then they louse connection is it to do with that i have 18 byte of data? Slow net (even though is it good) There Problems?
I dont undertand please help. :confused:
